title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "Selected Poems" by D.H. Lawrence, New Directions Books", 1947
medium: Lithography in brown and yellow ink on off-white shiny wove paper
signed: Signed in brown ink, front cover upper right: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed vertically in white ink, spine: SELECTED POEMS. Printed vertically in brown ink, spine: D H LAWRENCE; printed horizontally in brown ink, spine lower margin with in white square: NC 19.

Printed in white ink, front cover center: SELECTED POEMS d h lawrence.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Bookjacket design. Design on yellow ground. On right, cover depicts two organic, amorphous eagle-like forms with a curved "head" and wings that extend to a jagged bottom. Front eagle form is solid brown in lower right corner of cover. Second eagle form is a larger white mirror image of first directly behind and left of first. It is intersected by rows of yellow scribbes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "Selected Poems" by D.H. Lawrence, New Directions Books", 1947.
1947. Lithography in brown and yellow ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-165-10.
